text: Tanja Fajon (; born May 9, 1971) is a Slovenian politician. She was the leader of Social Democrats. She has served as the Minister of Foreign Affairs in the government of Prime Minister Robert Golob since 1 June 2022. She was a Member of the European Parliament (MEP) from Slovenia from 2009 until 2022. She is currently a head of the Slovenian delegation within the political group of Progressive Alliance of Socialists and Democrats. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:People from Ljubljana Category:MEPs for Slovenia
title: Tanja Fajon
